code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt complained of critical night blindness. pt denied any fall or trauma. she is a 61 yr old white F. o:Height 161 cm, Weight 50.9 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 102, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, Skin = multiple pigmented nevi on the face, Skin = hyperpigmentation over axillary creases a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

tr.td: Westside Ear Nose and Throat and Facial Plastic Surgery Center

td.content: s:pt presents with 2 weeks history of critical night blindness. pt also reports Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. she is a female aged 61 yrs. pt reports that she smokes once or twice daily she drinks alcohol heavily for the past 4 years o:Height 160 cm, Weight 49.5 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 101, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, Skin = multiple pigmented nevi on the face, Skin = hyperpigmentation over axillary creases a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Full-Field Electroretinogram.

content2.Unmatched: pt reports that she smokes once or twice daily she

td.content: s:62 yr old white F with C/O severe difficulty reading, severe poor night vision and severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye. she drinks at least 4 beers a day pt reports that she smokes once or twice daily o:Height 159 cm, Weight 49 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 14 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

tr.td: Westside Ear Nose and Throat and Facial Plastic Surgery Center

td.content: s:a 62 year old female manicurist presents with severe difficulty reading, severe poor night vision and severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye for 12 days. she has a history of Retinitis Pigmentosa for past 5 years. patient reports that she smokes once or twice daily she is a chronic alcoholic o:Height 161 cm, Weight 51.3 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments.
